media.headline: Tigers honor Mike Ilitch
media.blurb: BOS@DET: Tigers remember Mike Ilitch with Mr. I logo
media.bigblurb: The Tigers honor late owner Mike Ilitch with a "Mr. I" logo on the field and by raising a flag prior to their home opener

media.headline: Tigers players remember Mr. I
media.blurb: BOS@DET: Tigers players honor Mike Ilitch's legacy
media.bigblurb: Tigers players pay tribute to the team's late owner Mike Ilitch by looking back on his legacy prior to the team's home opener

media.headline: Martinez's sacrifice fly
media.blurb: BOS@DET: Martinez opens the scoring with a sac fly
media.bigblurb: Victor Martinez produces the first run at Comerica Park in 2017, chasing home Ian Kinsler with a sacrifice fly to give the Tigers a 1-0 lead

media.headline: Jones' great sliding catch
media.blurb: BOS@DET: Jones makes a smooth catch in deep center
media.bigblurb: JaCoby Jones tracks down a fly ball off the bat of Jackie Bradley Jr., making a nice sliding catch in center field in the 2nd inning

media.headline: Red Sox turn double play
media.blurb: BOS@DET: Pedroia starts 4-6-3 double play to end 2nd
media.bigblurb: Dustin Pedroia starts a 4-6-3 double play to get the Red Sox out of the bottom of the 2nd inning

media.headline: Wayne State Quartet sings anthem
media.blurb: BOS@DET: Wayne State University Quartet sings anthem
media.bigblurb: The Wayne State University Quartet performs the national anthem at Comerica Park before the Tigers take on the Red Sox

media.headline: Tigers honor Mike Ilitch
media.blurb: BOS@DET: Tigers honor late owner Mike Ilitch
media.bigblurb: Prior to the Tigers' home opener, the club honors late owner Mike Ilitch with a tribute video and ceremony

media.headline: Fulmer fans Moreland
media.blurb: BOS@DET: Fulmer strikes out Moreland to escape a jam
media.bigblurb: Michael Fulmer gets Mitch Moreland swinging to escape a bases-loaded jam in the top of the 4th inning

media.headline: Red Sox lineup announced
media.blurb: BOS@DET: Red Sox lineup announced at Comerica Park
media.bigblurb: The lineup for the Red Sox is announced prior to the team's matchup with the Tigers at Comerica Park

media.headline: Tigers' lineup announced
media.blurb: BOS@DET: Tigers' lineup introduced before home opener
media.bigblurb: The Tigers' lineup gets introduced at Comerica park prior to the team's home opener vs. the Red Sox

media.headline: Leon catches Collins stealing
media.blurb: BOS@DET: Leon nabs Collins trying to steal second
media.bigblurb: Sandy Leon catches Tyler Collins attempting to steal second base, ending the bottom of the 4th inning

media.headline: Jones' parents on watching him
media.blurb: BOS@DET: Jones' parents on watching their son play
media.bigblurb: JaCoby Jones' parents take some time to talk about what it's like witnessing their son's achievements in the Major Leagues

media.headline: Castellanos' triple
media.blurb: BOS@DET: Castellanos smacks a triple to left-center
media.bigblurb: Nicholas Castellanos gets the Tigers going in the bottom of the 6th inning with a one-out triple into the left-center-field gap

media.headline: V-Mart's RBI single
media.blurb: BOS@DET: V-Mart drives home Castellanos with a single
media.bigblurb: Victor Martinez smacks a single the other way to bring home Nicholas Castellanos and extend the Tigers' lead to 2-0 in the 6th inning

media.headline: Wilson strikes out Selsky
media.blurb: BOS@DET: Wilson strikes out Selsky to retire the side
media.bigblurb: Justin Wilson fans Steve Selsky to end the top of the 7th inning, preserving the Tigers' lead at 2-0

media.headline: McCann's two-run home run
media.blurb: BOS@DET: McCann drills a two-run homer to left field
media.bigblurb: James McCann deposits a ball into the left-field seats for a two-run homer, pushing the Tigers' lead to 4-0 in the bottom of the 7th inning

media.headline: Gould sings God Bless America
media.blurb: BOS@DET: Staff Sgt. Gould performs God Bless America
media.bigblurb: Michigan Army National Guard Staff Sergeant Amy Gould performs God Bless America during the 7th-inning stretch of the Tigers' home opener

media.headline: Young's RBI double
media.blurb: BOS@DET: Young gets Sox on the board with RBI double
media.bigblurb: Chris Young lines the ball down the left-field line for a double, plating Andrew Benintendi to get the Red Sox on the board in the 8th

media.headline: Bradley Jr.'s RBI single
media.blurb: BOS@DET: Bradley Jr. plates Moreland with single
media.bigblurb: Jackie Bradley Jr. delivers an RBI single, slicing the Tigers' lead to 4-2 in the top of the 8th inning

media.headline: Panda's three-run long ball
media.blurb: BOS@DET: Sandoval gives Sox lead with three-run homer
media.bigblurb: Pablo Sandoval drives a three-run home run to left-center field, giving the Red Sox a 5-4 lead in the top of the 8th inning

media.headline: Mahtook's game-tying RBI double
media.blurb: BOS@DET: Mahtook ties the game with an RBI double
media.bigblurb: Mikie Mahtook comes up clutch with an RBI double to tie the game at 5 in the bottom of the 8th inning

media.headline: Upton scores on walk
media.blurb: BOS@DET: Jones plates Upton with bases-loaded walk
media.bigblurb: JaCoby Jones takes a payoff pitch from Joe Kelly high for ball four, forcing in a run to give the Tigers a 6-5 lead in the bottom of the 8th

media.headline: K-Rod locks down win
media.blurb: BOS@DET: Rodriguez retires Young for the win
media.bigblurb: With two men in scoring position, Francisco Rodriguez forces Chris Young to pop out, earning the win in the Tigers' home opener

media.headline: Statcast: Bradley's running grab
media.blurb: BOS@DET: Bradley Jr. runs down a fly ball
media.bigblurb: Statcast measures the catch probability of a Jackie Bradley Jr. running grab

media.headline: Fulmer stellar in home opener
media.blurb: BOS@DET: Fulmer holds Sox scoreless over six frames
media.bigblurb: Michael Fulmer delivers six scoreless innings while striking out four in the Tigers' 2017 home opener against the Red Sox

media.headline: Red Sox get lead with big inning
media.blurb: BOS@DET: Sox put up five runs to take the lead in 8th
media.bigblurb: The Red Sox score five times in the top of the 8th inning, capped by Pablo Sandoval's three-run home run to take a 5-4 lead over the Tigers

media.headline: Mahtook on game-tying hit
media.blurb: BOS@DET: Mahtook on game-tying pinch-hit in the 8th
media.bigblurb: Mikie Mahtook discusses his game-tying pinch-hit in the 8th inning against the Red Sox

media.headline: Jones on playing at home
media.blurb: BOS@DET: Jones on playing in front of the home crowd
media.bigblurb: JaCoby Jones discusses playing in front of the home crowd and hoping to win more games

media.headline: Recap: BOS 5, DET 6
media.blurb: 4/7/17: Tigers rally late for win in home opener
media.bigblurb: Daily Recap: The Tigers score twice in the bottom of the 8th to earn a 6-5 comeback victory over the Red Sox in their home opener

media.headline: 4/7/17 CG: BOS@DET
media.blurb: 4/7/17 Condensed Game: BOS@DET
media.bigblurb: 4/7/17 Condensed Game: BOS@DET
